title: I CAN'T LOG ONTO MY ACCOUNT !
body: PLZ CHECK P3RFEC7PAER 。 I THINK NO ONE ON MY ACCOUNT ,BUT IT SAID U LEFT GAME IN PROGRESS ~I DON'T KNOW WHY !

replies.body:
Hey P3rfec7Payer,

Thanks for writing in!  Unfortunately, there is not too much support I can provide on the Forums regarding your account not being able to be accessed.  I strongly recommend that you open a new ticket with Player Support, which you can find here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new

Simply explain the situation in the ticket, and we will confirm the original ownership of the account!  We look forward hearing from you!  ^.^
